column4: Hello all.  Could someone give me recommendation on installing Google Chrome? I'm getting the impression that installing it from the repositories, and installing it from google's website are two different things.
Pros and cons one way or the other?
I would prefer the one in the repository for update purposes. But is the one from google's website better, or more feature packed, than the one in the repository?
There is no con from installing using PPA as far as I know. Infact, its convenient
